SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: This is an example of creating a portfolio enrolment document for a class enrolment. The parameters passed were: planID=12345, type=p, instanceID=123, portfolioTypeID=54321, contactID=411411

PARAMETERS.NAME: planID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ID of a template to use.

PARAMETERS.NAME: contactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The contact that the portfolio will be created for.

PARAMETERS.NAME: portfolioTypeID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ID of the Portfolio Type that will determine the type of portfolio item that is generated.

PARAMETERS.NAME: instanceID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ID of the linked instance. If the contactID and instanceID match a class enrolment, the portfolio item will be linked as an enrolment document.

PARAMETERS.NAME: type
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The type of instance (w = workshop, p = class).

PARAMETERS.NAME: folder
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The folder of that the file will be stored against in the portfolio item.

PARAMETERS.NAME: replaceContent
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: JSON object (stringified) containing key value pairs. Keys will represent template fields which will then be replaced within the template, allowing custom content to be added. The values can be HTML content that the template field will be replaced with.

PARAMETERS.NAME: registration
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Used only for Registration type portfolio objects.

PARAMETERS.NAME: name
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Used only for Qualification type portfolio objects.

PARAMETERS.NAME: specialty
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Used only for Qualification type portfolio objects.

PARAMETERS.NAME: startDate
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Used only for Qualification type portfolio objects.

PARAMETERS.NAME: status
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Used only for Qualification type portfolio objects and only for clients who have enabled the system setting. Valid values are: Completed, Commenced, Attended, Suspended, Canceled, Withdrawn, and Pending

DESCRIPTION: Will create a Portfolio item and generate a PDF of a template that will be saved against the contact Portfolio. If the linked instance ID and contact ID matches a class enrolment, an enrolment document will be created by linking the portfolio item to the class enrolment.
